parameter.value: Welcome, adventurer |PLAYERNAME|! If you are new in Tibia, ask me for help.
Of course, just browse through my wares.
First you should try to get some gold to buy better equipment.
If you need money you should slay monsters and take their gold. Look for spiders and rats.
First you should buy a bag or backpack. That way your hands will be free to hold a weapon and a shield.
There are spiders' nests beyond our city near Gorn's shop and at the McRonalds' farm in the east.
There are sewers underneath the city. They say these sewers are brimming with rats.
Job? I have no job. I just live for the gods of Tibia.
They created Tibia and all life on it.
That is where we are. The world of Tibia. Admire its beauty.
There are really too many of them in Tibia. But who am I to challenge the wisdom of the gods?
If you need money you should slay monsters and take their gold. Look for spiders and rats.
